EmailTemplate.subject: How Aspirus Automates and Expands Infrastructure with Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Using Turbonomic, Aspirus Wausau Hospital was able to make smarter hardware purchasing decisions, save time, and eliminate contention by leveraging automation.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/videos/customer-success-aspirus-wausau-hospital/]]>
"The trend in healthcare today is preventative medicine, making sure people don't get sick in the first place...that's exactly what we're doing with our virtual infrastructure with Turbonomic, it's awesome." - Jesse Kozikowski, Server Analyst II, Aspirus Wausau Hospital
Schedule a demo <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo/]]> and learn how Turbonomic can help your IT organization optimize for performance, compliance, and cost in real-time.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
